name: HauntedDepths
description:
A VERY short dungeon crawler - using blocks was nice for movement and art, but not for large map making - where you have to escape a crypt. Throughout the crypt are orbs that you may use to gain power in exchange for your life. Choose if you want to gain power at such a cost, or if life is more precious.

The large number of blocks also kill the frames in some areas in spite of my attempts at optimization, and some of this code is held together with hopes, prayers, and duct tape.

Project Code: https://github.com/kyle-stevens/HauntedDepths (don't look, its embarrassingly spaghetti-ish)
